summary: A mod that replaces the "By the order of the Jarl..." dialog to "STOP RIGHT THERE CRIMINAL SCUM" for the male city guards.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Replaces the MaleGuard and MaleNordCommander's dialogue for arresting the player.



[color=#00ff00][u]Changes (Subtitles are changed too):[/u][/color]

[color=#ffff00]"By the order of the Jarl, stop right there!"[/color]
[color=#00ff00]to[/color]
[color=#ffff00]"Stop right there, criminal scum! Nobody breaks the law on my watch! I'm confiscating your stolen goods. Now pay your fine, or it's off to jail!"[/color]

[color=#00ff00]and[/color]

[color=#ffff00]"You have committed crimes against Skyrim and her people, what say you and your defense?"[/color]
[color=#00ff00]to[/color]
[color=#ffff00]"[/color][color=#ffff00]Stop! You violated the law! Pay the court a fine or serve your sentence! Your stolen goods are now forfeit."[/color]



That's basically it. just these two lines. Maybe I'll change more of the dialogue in the future.


[/center]
author: XxTWDxX
